summary.heading:
Networking
Automation Certifications
summary.description: Certify your networking automation knowledge using Consul.

hero.heading:
Networking
Automation Certification
hero.description: Pass the Consul Associate certification exam to validate your networking automation skills.

exams.title: Consul Associate
exams.description: The Consul Associate 003 is an upcoming certification for site reliability engineers (SREs), solutions architects (SAs), DevOps professionals, or other cloud engineers who know HashiCorp Consul fundamentals and have the skills to build, secure, and maintain Consul. Candidates will be best prepared for this exam if they have professional experience using Consul in production, but performing the exam objectives in a personal demo environment may also be sufficient. This person understands available Consul Enterprise features and can differentiate between Enterprise and Community Edition.

exams.title: Consul Associate
exams.description: The Consul Associate Certification is for Site Reliability Engineers, Solutions Architects, DevOps professionals, or other Cloud Engineers who know the basic concepts and skills to build, secure, and maintain HashiCorp Consul Community. This includes understanding what enterprise features exist and what can and cannot be done using the community offering. You will be best prepared for this exam if you have professional experience using Consul in production, but performing the exam objectives in a personal demo environment may be sufficient.
